Mission selection Space station Statistics Options
Your main task is to destroy as many meteorites as possible and do it ahead of the rest. Do not stop at anything to fulfill the main goal. For the destruction of meteorites, you will receive money for which you can improve your spaceship and take a leading position in your universe.
Your main task is to destroy as many of your competitors as possible. Technologies have reached such a level that weapons do not harm spaceships and for destruction it is necessary to collide them with meteorites. For the destruction of competitors, you will receive money for which you can improve your spaceship and take a leading position in your universe. fly
